nylasGetTeamAvailability.description: Check availability for multiple teams within a date range. Returns time slots showing when team members are free or busy.
nylasGetTeamAvailability.successMessage: Successfully retrieved availability for {{teamCount}} teams across {{slotCount}} time slots

parameters.dateRange: Date range to check (start and end dates in ISO format)
parameters.timeRange: Optional time range to filter results within each day
parameters.slotDurationMinutes: Duration of each time slot in minutes (default: 30)

nylasFindOptimalSlots.description: Find the best meeting times when all or most team members are available.
nylasFindOptimalSlots.successMessage: Found {{slotCount}} optimal slots where {{availability}} are free
nylasFindOptimalSlots.errorMessage: Failed to find optimal meeting slots

parameters.teamNames: Team names to include in the search
parameters.dateRange: Date range to search (start and end dates)
parameters.requireAllFree: If true, only return slots where everyone is free (default: true)
parameters.limit: Maximum number of slots to return (default: 10)

nylasCreateTeamMeeting.description: Schedule a meeting with multiple teams and external contacts. Supports recurring meetings.

parameters.organizerProfile: Label of email profile to use as organizer (e.g., "Regulatory Team IL")
parameters.externalContacts: External contacts to invite (array of {name, email} objects)
parameters.meetingDetails: Meeting details (title, description, location, date, time, duration, timezone)

nylasCreateWeeklyTeamSync.description: Quickly create a recurring weekly sync for team(s). Simplified version of nylasCreateTeamMeeting.
nylasCreateWeeklyTeamSync.errorMessage: Failed to create weekly team sync

parameters.title: Meeting title
parameters.dayOfWeek: Day of week for the meeting (Monday-Friday)
